title: "Location and temporal memory of objects declines in aged marmosets (Callithrix jacchus)"
excerpt: "Episodic memory decline is an early marker of cognitive aging in human. Although controversial in animals and called “episodic-like memory”, several models have been successfully developed, however they rarely focused on ageing."
